timeline.message:
Temporarily disable FT 3.0 TCK metrics tests

Temporarily disable the metrics tests until the TCK is updated to
support MP Metrics 3.0

Temporarily disable FT 3.0 TCK metrics tests

Temporarily disable the metrics tests until the TCK is updated to
support MP Metrics 3.0

Make FT 3.0 use Metrics 3.0 instead of 2.3

MP Fault Tolerance 3.0 will release alongside MP Metrics 3.0, so we need
them to work together.

This PR changes the metrics integration to use 3.0 instead of 2.3.
Breaking changes in Metrics 3.0 mean that the same jar cannot support
both versions of MP Metrics. (The source code will actually compile and
run against either, but the built binary will only be compatible with
the version it was compiled against.)

An additional autofeature and bundle could be added later to support
Metrics 2.3 as well if required.
Update tests to use MP FT 3.0 and MP Metrics 3.0

Update MetricRemovalTest for MP Metrics 3.0

Update this Fault Tolerance test so that it's compatible with MP Metrics
3.0.

Previously this test used a custom servlet to print out metrics to avoid
the differences in output format between different versions of MP
Metrics. With the breaking changes in MP Metrics 3.0, it's easier to
work around the output differences and just use the /metrics endpoint
